User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the Local Buddy Pro application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches auth.uid).

photoUrl.description: URL of the user's profile photo.

level.description: The user's current level (e.g., Rookie, Pro, Local Hero).

verificationStatus.description: The user's verification status (e.g., pending, verified).

mobileVerified.description: Indicates if the user's mobile number is verified.

aadharVerified.description: Indicates if the user's Aadhar/ID is verified.

joinDate.description: The date the user joined the platform.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task posted on the Local Buddy Pro platform.

category.description: The category of the task (e.g., Household, Tech, Delivery).

budget.description: The budget allocated for the task.

location.description: The location where the task needs to be performed.

status.description: The current status of the task (e.g., Open, Assigned, Completed).

posterId.description: Reference to User who posted the task.

buddyId.description: Reference to User who is assigned to the task.

deadline.description: The deadline for the task completion.

paymentMode.description: The mode of payment for the task.

duration.description: Estimated time duration to complete the task.

tip.description: Optional tip amount for the buddy.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a chat session between a poster and a buddy for a specific task.

id.description: Unique identifier for the chat session.

taskId.description: Reference to Task that this chat is associated with.

participantIds.description: Array of user IDs participating in the chat.

messages.description: Array of messages in the chat session.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a transaction record (Lock, Release, Add, Withdraw).

userId.description: Reference to User that initiated the transaction.

taskId.description: Reference to Task that the transaction is for (if applicable).

type.description: The type of transaction (e.g., Lock, Release, Add, Withdraw).

amount.description: The amount involved in the transaction.

status.description: The status of the transaction (e.g., Success, Pending, Failed).

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who this notification is for.

message.description: The main content of the notification.

taskId.description: The ID of the task related to this notification, if any.

isRead.description: Whether the user has read the notification.

timestamp.description: The time the notification was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Uses path-based ownership for private user data.

/users/{userId}/notifications/{notificat.description: Stores notifications for a specific user. Path-based ownership ensures privacy.

/tasks/{taskId}.description: Stores tasks posted on the platform. Includes 'posterId' to associate the task with the user who posted it, as well as 'buddyId' to save the user assigned to the task.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Stores chat sessions between users for specific tasks. Includes 'taskId' and a list of participantIds to secure the chat.

/transactions/{transactionId}.description: Stores transaction records related to wallet operations. Includes 'userId' and 'taskId' to track user and task associations.
